item.title: OpenPPG SP140 Configurator
item.description: Connect Controller config Orientation Left Hand Right Hand Units Metric Altitude (m) Baro Pressure Calibration mbar Get baro pressure for your area here Beta: Auto Baro Pressure Calibration mbar Press refresh button to get baro pressure for your current location. Then copy it to the baro input Performance Mode Chill Sport Armed Time: Device ID: Firmware Version: .

item.title: OpenPPG X4 Configurator
item.description: Connect Controller config Orientation Left Hand Right Hand Units Metric Temperature (c) Metric Altitude (m) Baro Pressure Calibration mbar Get baro pressure for your area here Beta: Auto Baro Pressure Calibration mbar Press refresh button to get baro pressure for your current location. Then copy it to the baro input Battery Battery Min Voltage (0%) volts for 6S Lipo use 42 and for 7S Lipo use 49 Battery Max Voltage (100%) volts for 6S Lipo use 50 and for 7S Lipo use 58.
